page.title: 15MOTORWAYS
page.content: A Motorway is where vehicles go and the motorway has got six separate lanes, 3 one way and three go the other way. Motorways are built because it's a quicker way of going to work or making deliveries. There aren't any bends to slow you down,and there are no traffic lights or zebra crossings to cause stoppages. Cars, vans and trucks travel on the motorway, but more cars are on the motorway than other vehicles because there are more people with cars than other vehicles. Motorways must not be used by pedestrians, people learning to drive, cyclists or drivers of mopeds. You are not allowed to reverse, turn round or stop except in an emergency. Neither must you go over the speed limit of seventy miles per hour. When it is wet or foggy, your speed must be kept down to a safe level.
